longBusinessSummary: FDCTech, Inc. operates as a technology provider and software developer for digital assets. The company operates through three segments: Technology and Software Development; Wealth Management; and Margin Brokerage Business. It operates Condor Pro Multi-Asset Trading Platform, a regulatory-grade trading platform for day traders and retail investors that features front-end, back-end, news feeds, and charting system, as well as risk management, pricing engine, and connectivity to liquidity providers or market makers for markets, such as forex, stocks, commodities, digital assets, and other financial products. The company also operates Condor Risk Management Back Office, Condor Pricing Engine, Digital Assets Web Trader Platform, and other digital assets-related solutions. In addition, it provides licensing solutions for financial advisers and accountants; and financial planners, licensing, compliance, and education solutions. Further, the company offers investment advice; acts as agent and principal; and safeguards and administers assets in forex, equity, commodities, spread bets, and other financial assets. The company was formerly known as Forex Development Corporation and changed its name to FDCTech, Inc. in February 2018. FDCTech, Inc. was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Irvine, California.
